com.cyc.baseclient.subl.subtypes

Class AbstractSublSingleArgFunction<T,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.baseclient.cycobject.DefaultCycObjectImpl
      • com.cyc.baseclient.subl.subtypes.BasicSublFunction
        • com.cyc.baseclient.subl.subtypes.AbstractSublSingleArgFunction<T,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - evaluation argument type
    V - evaluation return type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CycObject, SublFunction, Comparable<Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SublBooleanSingleArgFunction, SublCycListSingleArgFunction, SublCycObjectSingleArgFunction, SublObjectSingleArgFunction, SublStringSingleArgFunction

    public abstract class AbstractSublSingleArgFunction<T,V>
extends BasicSublFunction
    Extends BasicSublFunction to provide support methods for evaluating the function with a single argument. This class does not provide a method for evaluating the SubL function, but there are classes which extend this one and do provide such methods.

    Because this class extends BasicSublFunction, it provides all of the methods necessary to satisfy the SublSourceFile interface.

    Author:
    nwinant
